core.account

Class AccountManager<E extends Account>

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.account.AccountManager<E>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminAccountManager, UserAccountManager

    public abstract class AccountManager<E extends Account>
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that manages all kinds of accounts in this system.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected AccountManager(java.util.List<E> accounts)
      Constructs an AccountManager with a list of accounts and a list of actionReverters.

      • AccountManager

        protected AccountManager(java.util.List<E> accounts)
        Constructs an AccountManager with a list of accounts and a list of actionReverters.
        Parameters:
        accounts - a list of Account that contains one type of accounts.

    • Method Detail

      • getAccount

        public E getAccount(java.lang.String username)
        Gets the Account from all users with the specified username.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the account to be searched
        Returns:
        the Account with the specified username, or null if there is no such Account found in accounts.

      • getAccounts

        public java.util.List<E> getAccounts(Criterion<E> criterion)
        Get all accounts that satisfy some criterion
        Parameters:
        criterion - the criterion that will be used to filter users
        Returns:
        a collection of all satisfied users

      • getPassword

        public java.lang.String getPassword(E account)
        Gets the password of this Account.
        Parameters:
        account - the Account that wants to access password.
        Returns:
        the password of this Account.

      • setPassword

        public ActionReverter setPassword(E account,
                                  java.lang.String password)
        Sets the password of this Account.
        Parameters:
        account - the Account that wants to change password.
        password - the new password to be set for this Account.
        Returns:
        ActionReverter of the setting password.

      • getMessageReceived

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMessageReceived(E account)
        Gets a list of messages that this Account has received.
        Parameters:
        account - the Account that wants to access all messages received.
        Returns:
        MessageReceived, a list of String messages received of this Account.

      • getMessageSent

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMessageSent(E account)
        Gets a list of messages that this Account has sent.
        Parameters:
        account - the Account that wants to access all messages sent.
        Returns:
        MessageSent, a list of String messages sent by this Account.

      • usernameExists

        public boolean usernameExists(java.lang.String username)
        Checks if the username already exists in the system.
        Parameters:
        username - the username to be checked.
        Returns:
        true iff the input username already exists in the system

      • oneToAllMessage

        public void oneToAllMessage(Account sender,
                            java.lang.String msg)
        Sends message to the each Account in accounts on behalf of sender.
        Parameters:
        sender - the username of the Account who is sending this message.
        msg - the message sender wants to send.

      • getAccounts

        protected java.util.List<E> getAccounts()
        A list of accounts managed by this AccountManager.
        Returns:
        accounts stored in this AccountManager.
